name: ImagePusher
0:
”Alexa, open image pusher”
”Push me an image of a taco”
”Show me a gorilla”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: image pusher
des:
Tell Alexa to send you an image of a taco, and a link to a taco will pop up on your computer screen! (or whatever device you've selected as the default).

A Pushbullet is required to use this skill, as well as one or more devices connected to your account.

At the first time using this skill, you will be asked to link your Pushbullet account with the skill in the Alexa app. After doing so, relaunch the app. You will then need to select the default device to which you would like to push images to, by speaking to Alexa.

After setting those two things up, you are ready to use the skill! You can push any image to your device, simply by saying, "Alexa, ask image pusher to push me a taco man".
